title: Emotional aspects of pregnancy
creator_credit: Sally Marschall, Phillip Koch and Joshua Productions
brief_description: Prepares the expectant mother and father for emotional changes, highlighting the experiences of two expectant couples and of one single expectant mother. During pregnancy, the woman’s feelings become more intense. The man’s feelings change also. Relationships with family and friends take on new dimensions. Both need reassurance that they are loved.
